review: Almost prefect if only the voice recognition worked on other installed apps.
author: Rebecca L. Kent

review: Great product!  I can find just about anything that I want to watch without having to pay for a package that contains a bunch of programming that I don't want.  I'll be able to substantially reduce my cable bill and still be able to watch all my favorite programs.
author: WAYNE HAWKINS

review: Was unable to stream a particular website
author: Danita Y. Miles

review: Delivered on time and works great
author: L maynard

review: Works great but wish it came with cords to hook to tv and A LOT of things we want to watch with amazon Prime we still have to pay for.
author: Jenny Watson

review: Great product. Really like having the Plex app. Apple TV doesn't have that.
author: David Moore

review: A breeze to set up and worked as promised.
author: Rebecca S. Johnson

review: I haven't had time to figure it all out yet  the movie selection seems not as good as I expected, but I'm still trying to figure out what comes with the Prime subscription and what I have to pay additionally.  I hope to cut my Comcast cost with this
author: David G. Welsh
